metadata.title: CVE-2021-33195 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Go before 1.15.13 and 1.16.x before 1.16.5 has functions for DNS lookupsthat do not validate replies from DNS servers, and thus a return value maycontain an unsafe injection (e.g., XSS) that does not conform to theRFC1035 format.

criterions.comment: golang-1.16 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
